Observation and handling of energies 

Risk Based Observation technique - RIBO 

OVERSIGHT: Before starting a job, stop and get an overview of the area in which you are about to work. 
LIMIT THE AREA: Split the working area into smaller segments to give you the required overview. 
SPOT ENERGY: Identify those types of energies in and around your work area that can represent a risk. Implement and note eventual measures to be taken to secure safe job execution.
